response.overview: We have all been there: A noise escapes in the bus, followed by an unpleasant smell â€“ and everyone knows where it came from. But why are farts so embarrassing? At least that is what fart star Pongy Pippa wonders. She dances with tubas and trumpets in time with our digestion to show how much work and skill goes into making such sounds. A musical show for the most human of noises.
response.title: The Little Puffy Fart Revue
